name: Stalwart Mail Server
longDescription:
Stalwart Mail Server is an all-in-one mail server solution that includes JMAP, IMAP, and SMTP servers. It is designed to be secure, fast, and reliable, with a focus on ease of use and modern features.

Key features include:

  • JMAP (RFC 8620) support for modern mail clients
  • IMAP4rev2 (RFC 9051) and POP3 support for traditional mail clients
  • SMTP support with DKIM, SPF, and DMARC
  • Built-in spam and phishing filtering
  • Sieve scripting for mail filtering and automation
  • Web administration interface
  • Support for multiple domains and users
  • TLS encryption for secure communication
  • ACME support for automatic TLS certificate management

Stalwart Mail Server is available as a Docker image and can be easily deployed on any system that supports Docker.
description: All-in-one mail server with JMAP, IMAP, and SMTP support.
